text: w'in hdha alquran aldhy dhukirat fih hadhih alqasas alsadqt, lamnzzal min khaliq alkhlq, wmalk al'amr klh, nazal bih jbryl alamyn, ftlah ealayk - 'ayuha alrasul - hataa weyth bqlbk hfzana wfhmana; litakun min rusul allah aladhin ykhwwifwn qawmahum eiqab allh, ftndhr bhdha altnzyl al'iins waljinu ajmeyn. nazal bih jbryl ealayk bilughat earabiat wadihatan almena, zahirat aldlalt, fima yhtajwn 'iilayh fi 'iislah shuuwn dinahum wdnyahm
